title: Titanic Departs from Southampton
description: The RMS Titanic begins her maiden voyage, departing from Southampton, England, with approximately 2,224 passengers and crew members.

title: Iceberg Spotted
description: Lookouts spot an iceberg in the ship's path. Despite attempts to maneuver the ship away, the Titanic strikes the iceberg.

title: Orders to Launch Lifeboats
description: About an hour after the collision, Captain Smith orders the crew to load women and children into the lifeboats.

title: First Lifeboat Launched
description: The first lifeboat is launched. It can carry 65 people, but leaves with only 28 on board.

title: Titanic Sinks
description: The Titanic sinks beneath the Atlantic Ocean, two hours and forty minutes after colliding with the iceberg.

title: Rescue by RMS Carpathia
description: The RMS Carpathia arrives on the scene and rescues approximately 705 survivors from the lifeboats.
